problems.title: Generate All Binary Strings of Length N (No Leading Zero Restriction)
problems.description:
Given N, generate all binary strings of length N using recursion. Leading zeros are allowed.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print each binary string on a new line. Any order is accepted.
hintsList: At each step append '0' or '1' and recurse until length == n, then print curr.
